query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Dissemination and Communication Plan, including project identity
result.description: The plan will include concrete actions aimed to i engage stakeholders with the most appropriate information streams regarding the stakeholder analysis developed in WP1 and ii to propose a strategy and a timeline for the communication and dissemination activities and events to be organized and attended for the project duration The Plan includes actively the liaison with BRIDGE initiative and The Coalition for Energy Savings A monitoring framework using quantitative and qualitative measures will be developed to assess the impact of the awareness raising and dissemination campaign

result.title: Project brochure, posters, roll-up, and infographics (first version)
result.description: Throughout the duration of SMART2B several printed electronic and audiovisual material including relevant infographics will be produced aiming at reaching a variety of stakeholders and the wider public SMART2Bs visual identity will be developed at the beginning of the project M3 to allow the production of promotion material such as project leaflet project poster and roll up Content input for the promotion material and dissemination will be provided by all the partners while D1 will coordinate the creation polishing printing and production of promotion material At least 3 promotional videos will be produced to effectively disseminate SMART2B activities and results Moreover project brochures posters pop up stands will be also designed and created within T82 to ensure SMART2Bs visibility into the researchers initiatives as well as to get feedback on the various products developed Project brochure posters rollup and infographics first final version

result.title: Complete chemical composition and bioactivity profiles of all extracts
result.description: A report on chemical composition and identification of interesting compounds and groups of compounds will be analyzed using GC-MS, HPLC, LC-MS/MS and DSA-MS and UPLC-MS/MS. Proteins will be assessed by SDS-PAGE as well as mass spectrometry based quantitative proteome analysis. Determination of molecular weight profiles and protein identity will be established.

result.title: Dissemination, Exploitation and Communication (DEC) Plan
result.description: All issues regarding the roll-out and scale-up of the project outcomes will be consolidated into business modelling and planning activities. These will be the key mechanisms for the market roll-out and exploitation of the solutions demonstrated after the end of the grant and will define the required sequence of operations and steps along with their specifications and necessary resources.
